name: Before Life, Choose Death
description:
You are a soul about to be born from out of your mother’s womb but another spirit stops you and tries to convince you not to live.

On the precipice of birth, you must convince the spirit and yourself on whether or not it's better to become a stillbirth.

Made By:

Writer- Blankmarks/Omni-Traveler

Traveler - Penana

Artist- Vandrake

www.artstation.com/genesisvandrake

Programmer- Kappuchuu
